message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $110?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my initial price. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we aim for $115 instead?
